mapper.update: update after_sale_info set review_reason = #{reviewReason}, review_reason_code = #{reviewReasonCode}, review_source = #{reviewSource}, review_time = #{reviewTime}, after_sale_status = #{afterSaleStatus} where after_sale_id = #{afterSaleId}
mapper.select: select * from after_sale_info where order_id = #{orderId} and after_sale_type_detail in #{item}
